statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); used=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.used_percentage // empty'); max_tokens=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.context_window.context_window_size // 0'); branch=$(git -C $(pwd) branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'no-git'); if [ -n "$used" ]; then used_k=$(echo "$used $max_tokens" | awk '{printf "%.0f", $1 * $2 / 100000}'); max_k=$((max_tokens / 1000)); printf "%s | Context: %.1f%% [%dk/%dk] | %s" "$model" "$used" "$used_k" "$max_k" "$branch"; else printf "%s | %s" "$model" "$branch"; fi
